DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 use G2-M-IS injector system conjunction cataract surgery vs. cataract surgery , subject mild moderate primary open-angle glaucoma .

DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent Model GTS400 use G2-M-IS injector system conjunction cataract surgery , compare cataract surgery , subject mild moderate primary open-angle glaucoma .
